import { Button, Card, CardContent, FormGroup, Grid, IconButton, Tooltip, Typography, } from '@material-ui/core' import { MoreHoriz, Public } from '@material-ui/icons' import { Box } from '@material-ui/system' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { photomanagement } from '../assets/photomanagement' export function ListCards({ card }) { const [files, setFiles] = useState([0]) useEffect(() => { function fechPhoto() { const files = card.map(result => result.files) for (let file of files) { setFiles(file) } } fechPhoto() }) console.log(files) return ( <>
